title: Subpart 641-1 - Rates for Non-State Providers of Residential Habilitation in Community Residences, Including Individualized Residential Alternatives (IRAs), and for Non-State Providers of Day Habilitation
content:

comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
